introduce_product: Baby-G introduces a whole new color palette of glossy solids into the line-up. its vivid colors, metallic dials and matching LCDs, these new colors are sure to make a splash. Blue resin band digital watch with a neutral face.
list_specification_product: Selectable illumination duration (1.5 seconds or 3 seconds), afterglow
29 time zones (27 cities + coordinated greenwich mean time), daylight saving on/off
Measuring modes: Elapsed time, split time, 1st-2nd place times
Countdown start time setting range: 1 to 60 minutes (1-minute increments)
Analog: 2 hands (hour, minute (hand moves every 20 seconds))
Digital: Hour, minute, second, pm, month, date, day
Approx. battery life: 2 years on SR726W × 2
